title: Shackled By A Heavy Burden

author.name: William J. Gaither
author.bio: William J. Gaither is an American singer and songwriter of southern gospel and Contemporary Christian music.

lyrics:
Shackled by a heavy burden
'Neath a load of guilt and shame,
Then the hand of Jesus touched me
And now I am no longer the same.

CHORUS:
He touched me,
O, He touched me
And O, the joy
That floods my soul
Something happened,
And now I know
He touched me
And made me whole.

Since I met this blessed Saviour
Since He cleansed
And made me whole
I will never cease to praise Him
I'll shout it while eternity rolls.
